reviewText: Great for fans from the early years of the sport of monster truck racing and long time fans of truck and tractor pulling. Fans of yesteryear! Wanna show your kids what started the monster racing craze or just how competitive pulling was in the 80's, this is a must own. I've had my copy since I was two and still watch it every once in a while and remember fondly a time when human ingenuity, not utter destruction ruled the landscape.
